data: Mirrh Yahn y Cona | Yrml Orise y Yrl
His first day on Earth promised to be even worse than Mirrh Yahn y Cona had feared when he left Yrml Orise y Yrl, his fiancee, to become Mars' first interplanetary ambassador.
